name: An authenticated Service Provider cannot send an RTP to an unactivated debtor
fullName: A Creditor Service Provider sends an RTP through API: An authenticated Service Provider cannot send an RTP to an unactivated debtor

steps.name: Given the debtor A has fiscal code random
And the debtor Service Provider is authenticated
Given the creditor Service Provider is authenticated
When the creditor Service Provider sends an RTP to the debtor A
Then the RTP is not created because the debtor is not activated

labels.name: feature
labels.value: A Creditor Service Provider sends an RTP through API

items.statusDetails: requests.exceptions.HTTPError: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: https://api-mcshared.uat.cstar.pagopa.it/auth/token
